website_summaries.verdict: A few quirks aside, this popcorn maker is an excellent and reliable choice if you need to make large quantities of popcorn at once.
pros: Stands out for its large capacity, as it can make up to 15 cups of popcorn at once – more than enough for a family or gathering
cons: This popcorn popper has a tendency to shoot out leftover kernels after a session, so you should keep a bowl or cloth near the chute

customer_reviews.title: Great popper!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a couple hot air poppers at local stores we purchased this one. One that we purchased locally was dead when we opened it. this one has been working great for a while now. The only problem is that when you start the machine it blows unpopped kernels out of the chute until popping starts.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another Cuisinart popper - only because several reviews said it was the "best of the best." So far, it seems to be nearly that. If I have any complaints so far, it's that the popped corn comes out with such force that it's hard to control/contain it. First time I used it, there was popped corn allll over my kitchen. I'm learning. Tonight, only three kernels got away from me. The results are light and fluffy and tasty!! Popping is very fast, too!
customer_reviews.author: calf

customer_reviews.title: ok machine fo the price but exacted more with the cuisinart name on it
customer_reviews.text: sad to say i have had better hot air poppers as a kid. i learned this particular model heats the popcorn form the bottom causing the kernels to jump up and down until popped. In my youth my family had a larger machine that had side vents to circulate the air which seems like a better model
customer_reviews.author: kyle ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Basic Popper
customer_reviews.text: The popcorn is effective at doing what popcorns do best—pop popcorn. Color is pretty, but not sure I see anything over and above other poppers that justifies the price. Wish it popped more popcorn at a time than this unit does. Lower cost poppers yield more cups. Nothing wrong with this machine. Pro is that it is pretty. I mean, who doesn’t want a pretty popcorn popper, right?
customer_reviews.author: A Lady on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Movie time !
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very good. Has a separate On/Off Sw on side. There is a butter meter, but it is just that. A little concerned that the clear plastic chute gets hot and may distort or craze over time. Large enough to product a hot batch for a small family simultaneously. Quality of pop corn is actually a fact to be concerned with as un-popped kerns are irritating waste of time and resource.

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Popper

This Popper does tend to throw the popcorn out fairly vigorously - you've been warned... I will often put a damp dish towel over the outlet and the capturing bowl to minimize the wild ones.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this popper to discontinue my microwave popcorn intake. After reading how bad microwave popcorn is for you I wanted an option that would allow me to still enjoy my favorite snack. The popper works well, although kernels will definitely jump out while its running, and some pop and fly onto the counter. No big deal, but it was kind of funny when they shot across the counter. It's very lightweight, but seems well made and looks nice although I store it away in the cabinet.

product_meta.title: Cuisinart EasyPop Hot Air Popcorn Maker (Red)
product_meta.description: Color:RedCuisinart as a brand is well known across the world for producing some of the best and most superior popcorn popper machines you can find. The Cuisinart EasyPop Popcorn Maker makes it easier than ever to pop crunchy homemade popcorn. The Cuisinart EasyPop Popcorn Maker pops up to 10 cups and has special vents in the popping bowl to let moisture escape. Popcorn lovers can select the desired amount to make popcorn just the way they like it. When popping is complete, they can serve it hot with or without butter. The Cuisinart EasyPop Popcorn Maker operates with the simple flip of a switch. Easy! Fast! Fun!
feature_bullets: Kernels go into a popping chamber - no oil is required - happens in less than 3 minutes!
Hot air sends up to 10 cups of popcorn up and out the chute right into a waiting bowl
Brushed stainless steel base with embossed logo
Convenient cord storage makes stowage hassle-free when not in use
Removable chute and butter warming tray for easy cleaning
